name: Hero Of A Thousand Devices
Lore: 'Left to his own devices, Artoo used his spunk and creativity to save his companions'' lives time and time again.',
Text: 'Deploy on one of your droids. During your deploy phase, may use 1 Force to search your Reserve Deck, take one device that deploys on a droid into hand and reshuffle. Also, you may forfeit devices deployed on this droid (forfeit value = destiny number).',
